content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace <MISSING CODE> so that the figure is drawn correctly?

choices.label: DrawLine (startX, startY, endX, endY)endY <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endY - 2

DrawLine (startX, startY, endX, endY)endX <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endX - 2endY <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endY - 2
endY <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endY - 2DrawLine (startX, startY, endX, endY)

endX <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endX - 2endY <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endY - 2DrawLine (startX, startY, endX, endY)

content.answer: DrawLine (startX, startY, endX, endY)endY <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> endY - 2
